related.meaning: sekarang, saat ini, masa depan dekat, suatu hari nanti, lain waktu

lessons.japanese: ここまで計画したのに、今更やめるって言わないでよ。
lessons.indonesian: Don't tell me you're going to back out after all the plans we've made.

lessons.japanese: 今更後悔しても無駄だ。
lessons.indonesian: It's no use regretting it now.

lessons.japanese: 今更悔やんでも後の祭りだ。
lessons.indonesian: It is too late to repent.

lessons.japanese: ここまで計画したのに、今更やめるって言わないでよ。
lessons.indonesian: Don't tell me you're going to back out after all the plans we've made.

lessons.japanese: 今更後悔しても無駄だ。
lessons.indonesian: It's no use regretting it now.

lessons.japanese: 今更悔やんでも後の祭りだ。
lessons.indonesian: It is too late to repent.

lessons.japanese: 今更どうしようもない事だ。
lessons.indonesian: It's too late to do anything about that now.

lessons.japanese: 今更どうしようもない事だ。
lessons.indonesian: It's too late to do anything about that now.

lessons.japanese: 今更そんなことしたって、遅いと思うよ。
lessons.indonesian: I guess it's too late to do that now.

lessons.indonesian: I think it's too late to do that now.

lessons.japanese: 今更そんなことしたって、遅いと思うよ。
lessons.indonesian: I guess that it's too late to do that now.
